10.1145/3543507.3583865.title: Moral Narratives Around the Vaccination Debate on Facebook
10.1145/3543507.3583865.author: Beir\'{o}, Mariano Gast\'{o}n and D'Ignazi, Jacopo and Perez Bustos, Victoria and Prado, Mar\'{\i}a Florencia and Kalimeri, Kyriaki
10.1145/3543507.3583865.paperMotivationText: Better understanding the narratives of anti-vaccination advocats can help to address specific concerns and drivers of vaccination hesitancy
10.1145/3543507.3583865.paperContributionText: Automatic analysis of moral framing of anti-vaccination advocats, based on  user-generated text, using an LSTM and entity linking information
10.1145/3543507.3583865.paperResultsText: Moral narratives of anti-vaccination advocats focus on moral value of liberty
10.1145/3543507.3583865.resourcesOtherText: New dataset of Facebook comments, annotated for stance and MFs
